nodes.text: PC-265 was a Lambda-class T-4a shuttle used by Governor Wilhuff Tarkin to travel to the Star Destroyer Optima.

PC-265 first appeared in the 2019 comic Star Wars Adventures: Return to Vader's Castle 2 by Cavan Scott. The shuttle's designation is a reference to May 26, the birth date of Peter Cushing, who portrayed Grand Moff Tarkin in Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope.
